properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NM, DECODE(MEMBER_GENDER, 'M', '남', '여') MEMBER_GENDER FROM "MEMBER" WHERE UNREGISTER_FL = 'N' ORDER BY MEMBER_NO DESC
UPDATE "MEMBER" SET MEMBER_NM = ?, MEMBER_GENDER = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ?
